levels.name: Your first note
levels.dialogue: Someone put my note on the board. But my favourite color is black!
levels.description:
On the left, you see a board. So far, there is only one note pinned on it. Your job is to hang notes on it, or change existing ones, according to people's wishes.

As you can see, Alex wants a note in black. Each note has attributes, such as height, width and background color, as seen in the class 'post-it'.

There is also the class alex. Any changes you declare in that class will only apply to the note that class is attached to.

So now, go ahead and change the attribute background-color of Angus' note to black!
